text: Nena, “Bwerani! Ine ndikuwerengerani zimene Ambuye wanu wakulamulani inu kuti musachite. Musapembedze milungu ina yowonjezera pa Iye; Muzionetsa chifundo kwa makolo anu; musaphe ana anu chifukwa chaumphawi, Ife timakudyetsani inu pamodzi ndi iwo; musayandikire zinthu zoipa zimene zili zoonekera kapena zili zobisika ndipo musaphe munthu amene Mulungu waletsa pokhapokha ngati pali chifukwa choyenera.” Ichi wakulamulani inu kuti muzindikire
